label: LogisticsLabel
comment: A label used for identifying goods for logistics purposes, such as a barcode, a radio frequency tag or a Vehicle Identification Number (VIN).

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the layout type of this logistics label.
The indication of whether or not there is a marking on this logistics label.
The identifier of the end of a series of packages within this referenced logistics package.
The identifier of the start of a series of packages within this referenced logistics package.
The code specifying the size of this logistics label.

objectProperties.comment: A section included in this logistics label.

referencedBy.comment: A barcode label that is a part of these logistics shipping marks.
A Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) label that is a part of these logistics shipping marks.
Radioactive labelling that is a part of these logistics shipping marks.
A Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) label that is a part of these logistics shipping marks.
